snippet: The Air Force says it disciplined five former commanders at Joint Base San Antonio-Lackland for not taking appropriate action in what has turned into the military branch’s worst sex scandal.
abstract: Air Force says it disciplined five former commanders at Joint Base San Antonio-Lackland for not reporting problems quickly or taking appropriate action in what has turned into military branch’s worst sex scandal.
lead_paragraph: The Air Force says it disciplined five former commanders at Joint Base San Antonio-Lackland for not taking appropriate action in what has turned into the military branch’s worst sex scandal.

headline.main: Texas: Five Former Commanders Punished in Air Force Sex Scandal
headline.print_headline: Texas: Five Former Commanders Punished In Air Force Sex Scandal
